title: An Awful moment
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: A judge finds himself the object of a gypsy woman’s anger and revenge when he passes sentence on her husband. Cast includes George Gebhardt, Marion Leonard, Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence, Linda Arvidson, Mack Sennett. Silent film with musical soundtrack and English intertitles.
creator_credit_for_label: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
